summary: Complete New Very Large Dungeon / Map / Level. Battle 40+ Creatures at Once. Enjoy Beautiful Natural Scenery. 4 Difficulty Settings
descriptionHtml:
Rama\'s Joy Ruins

==============================================================
Here is an absolutely awesome video showing the larger battles in my
level.

My friend who is doing this video demonstrates absolute mastery of 
combat skills that you would not have even thought possible within 
Skyrim\'s system.

He demonstrates Godly combat skill while simultaneously being poetic and fun

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JhgjDneLO8Q&feature=youtu.be

==============================================================

==============================================================
This is a very large level with beautiful Natural Scenery and big battles :)
==============================================================

This level is about Beautiful scenery, advanced, fast gameplay mechanics, and new exciting things that you probably didn\'t know the Skyrim Creation Engine could do :)

It is a level of moving walls,rotating bridges, and other tricks I learned to implement with the Creaton Kit.

My Joy Ruins is designed to cater to the gamer who wants intense hard battles and varied gameplay strategies, as well as the gamer who wants to enjoy new level mechanics and do a series of well-timed jumps 1000 feet in the air above a canyon as the Aurora Borealis shines above.

Expect Skyrim and your Dragon-Born to do things before your eyes that you never thought possible within the game environment

:)

-Rama

~~~

Fast Way To My Level

Just Fast Travel to Whiterun, and go behind Breezehome and Iron Maiden / the main smithing location. 

If you know what COC means, don\'t use it, it will not take you to the beginning of my level.

Enjoy!

~~~

====================

Huge Battles

In my level you will at times be facing 40+ creatures at the same time!

But they are much easier to destroy than normal :)

Enjoy the incredible battles!

=====================

4 Difficulty Settings

Good Fun - should be fun for everyone

Really Good Fun - more creatures spawn than Good Fun

Very Intense - more creatures and they are harder

Wow!!!!! - Your character will need super high armor and attack damage to complete this level of challenge

=======================

Customize your Display Settings

I am fully aware that there is an ever increasing variety of display settings that different people are using on 3 different systems!

I try to color my level to be pretty and wonderful for everyone, but with such a variety of machine settings, I determined the very best thing I could do was enable you to fine tune the display of my level to your exact preferences.

==================================================================
As a result I built a Display Settings menu system into my level.
==================================================================

This menu can be accessed with the spell that you learn upon entrance to my level.

My menu system remembers what menu you were in so when you recast the spell you can easily repeat/magnify the setting you were adjusting.

You can adjust the Color Saturation, Brightness, and Contrast of your display while in my level.

The settings you choose only affect my Joy Ruins level and cannot possibly affect the rest of your Skyrim Experience (if our friends at Bethesda add a payprus script function for GetCurrentImageSpace() then I could enable the spell to work anywhere).

The spell gives you the option to restore defaults any time.

You save your settings by saving the game.

==========================

Convenient Entrance In Whiterun

Go behind Breezehome and Iron Maiden to find the entrance to my level

:)

==========================

No Loading Screens Within Level

Through great effort on my part, and the robustness of the Creation Engine, I did not need to include any loading doors in my level.

So enjoy an ENTIRE rather large level with no loading screens!

I feel this level is large by any Skyrim dungeon standards, it is just a feat of effort and Creation Engine power that I did not need loading doors.


==========================

Level Instantly Resets

My Joy Ruins level instantly resets whenever you leave and re-enter, so you can do the level as many times as you want, all loot resets, and all my fancy puzzles reset as well.

==========================

Gameplay

There is a huge focus on gameplay in this level.

In this level you will encounter the following new gameplay elements


Exotic Room Shapes

I make an effort to present you with indoor rooms that are as varied in terrain and shape as many of the outdoor areas you are used to exploring.

You might forget at times that you are exploring an indoor dungeon!

Enjoy great views and jagged mountain skylines, huge deep canyons and an amazing waterfall Paradise

These large rooms are hand-crafted by me into their unusual shape and have a distinctive character.

==========================

For me, part of what makes Skyrim unique is the emphasis on Natural Beauty.

==========================

My levels continue this theme of Skyrim\'s, and I present you with my own rugged Natural Scenery and beautiful cave settings.


Advanced Jumping Sequences

You will have to use your jumping ability frequently!

You will encounter many sequences of jumps and will be quite happy to see how well our friends at Bethesda designed the DragonBorn\'s jumping mechanics.

If you enjoy jumping around mountains and finding unusual pathways to your destination, well these are things you HAVE to do in my Joy Ruins level!


==========================

3D Spatial Puzzles

You will encounter some puzzles in my level that encourage you think in a very spatial way.

These are not puzzles of a mental sort, more of a physical environment sort, you have to look around and think about how to move in new ways to take advantage of the terrain to achieve your goal

There are two settings for puzzle challenge/difficulty level

I assure you I have play tested this level MANY times, before telling me you think there\'s something not working in my level, make sure to really try and think in new ways and try new things to get past your current area.

The puzzle are designed to make you think, and try new things :)

========================

Manual Installation (PC)

========================

Installation is easy, you do not need a mod manager or the download manager.

1. Download the file by clicking on the _downloads_ button on this page

2. Save the file to a location that is easy to find, like your desktop or downloads folder

3. Unzip the file by double-clicking on it

4. Copy the Data folder over to your root skyrim directory, even if a Data folder is already present. 

This directory is _wherever your TESV.exe file is_, and is usually:

c:\\program files (x86)\\steam\\steamApps\\common\\skyrim


Choose yes whenever asked to confirm file copying. 

Again, make sure to choose to copy even if a Data folder is already present, as only my unique file names are in the Data folder structure that comes from the zip file.

Do not worry, you cannot possibly be damaging your original Skyrim files or any mod files, as all of my filenames are unique and have my name in them and only apply to my level.


5. Load the regular Skyrim installer. If you use a different method to launch Skyrim, make sure to launch the regular Skyrim .exe file first, which is called TESV.exe, so that the standard Skyrim launcher appears

6. Click on _Data Files_

7. Select my Joy Ruins .esp file which is now visible on the list because you moved it to the Data folder.

8. If you missed this fact elsewhere in this description, the entrance to my level is inside the town of White Run itself, check out the Story section.

9. Go behind the Iron Maiden in Whiterun, the entrance to my level is behind Breezehome and Iron Maiden

10. Enjoy!

~~~

No Main Plot Advancement Required

This level does NOT require you to know any shouts, and no plot advancement is required at all

==========

Story

Whiterun townspeople have reported hearing strange noises from an old underground piping system that has an entrance right behind the Iron Maiden.

No one has ever tried exploring the system because it is not in use and is presumed to be a relic from a timeperiod similar to the Skyforge. Because the system is so extensive and there is insufficient light or food supply for such a long exploration, no adventurer has yet attempted to chart the entire system.

However, now that strange noises are being reported, the Companions and even the Jarl of Whiterun have requested that you, the bravest and most powerful individual they know, to go investigate the strange occurrences.

They have warned you that whatever you find down there, it is up to you to resolve the mysterious disturbance and thus restore Harmony to Whiterun and Peace to the people who are wondering what manner of strange things are happening far below the surface of Whiterun\'s grounds.

~~~

You Enter the Piping System

After trekking through the vast piping system for days beneath the surface of Whiterun and what feels like most of Tamriel itself, using some spells for light in the utterly dark underground, you finally find the entrance to what appears to be a relatively normal looking cave.

There is a strange magnetic vibrancy in the air of this cave. 

You round a bend a behold an amazing sight!

Before you towers a huge Dwemer Ruin!

It is heavily damaged form what appears to be a very large cave collapse. 

As excited as you are, you realize you must return to the surface first and gather more supplies.

Now that you know the way, you can make the journey back much faster and commence thorough exploration of the ruin...



=====================
Positive Feedback Requested
=====================

Let me know what aspects of my level were your favorite!

This will help me get a sense of the everyone\'s personal favorite elements as I make my next level :)

And don\'t forget to endorse this mod/level/dungeon if you think others should also play it, so the word spreads :)

Victory to You!

<3

Rama

=====================

Known Issues

-If your game crashes while you are trying to loot bodies during the big 40+ creature battle scenes, or any time, the solution is to not loot. There is no plot-essential loot on any of the creatures.

-”Help I quit in the middle of a battle and loaded a different save game and the enemies followed me!” Solution: Petition some local guards for help, the creatures in my level REALLY like you once they spot you. Another solution is to re-enter my level. It is a good idea not to switch to different save games in the middle of a big battle if you don\'t want the creatures to follow you, either complete the level or finish the current battle :)

-the water turned mostly transparent and the waterfall splash effects are gone: If you Alt-Tab out of Skyrim too many times in one game session this does happen, this also removes the spell effects on your heal and other spells. You must restart Skyrim to get all the effects back and restore the water to normal. This is not particular to my level but I thought I\'d let you know :)

-The entrance/exit locations for the main whiterun gate somehow got altered slightly, and nothing I have tried could fix it, even referring to mod-cleaning procedures from prior Bethesda games and editing the “details” of my .esm file. The gate still works of course, but you spawn at slightly off-center locations. If anyone finds a way to restore the main gate spawn positions precisely to normal please do let me know. I will be doing future levels outside of Whiterun for this single reason :)

=====================
author: Rama
